Html:
Hi Kaziman,

Any ideas on this one - fresh install on Vista Business, VS 2008 and SQL2008?

Server Error in '/' Application.

The type Kigg.Service.UserScoreService does not have a constructor that takes the parameters (IUserScoreTable).

Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.

Exception Details: System.InvalidOperationException: The type Kigg.Service.UserScoreService does not have a constructor that takes the parameters (IUserScoreTable).

Source Error:

 

Line 18:         {

Line 19:             UnityConfigurationSection configuration = (UnityConfigurationSection) ConfigurationManager.GetSection("unity");

Line 20:             configuration.Containers.Default.Configure(_container);

Line 21:         }

Line 22:

Best regards,
Steve

Hi Kaziman,
Thanks for getting back. I am running the version for RC1.0. I'll upgrade to the RTM version and get back to you.
Best Regards,
Steve
